name: Kirkileons
description:
Kirkileons is a single player Tower Defence game. The game includes 2 planets containing 20 missions each(40 missions). The game relies on an original spawning
method that replaces the traditional standard waves method. The amount of foes depends on the percentage of magic energy VS anti-magic energy that your
generators produce.

The use of hotkeys is highly recommended .


I hope you enjoy!
